alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 21 at 1:50PM CDT until May 22 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe Pass in Texas. * WHEN...From 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ this evening to 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
